name: Thunder Shiviah
body:
### Welcome to my personal page.
My interests are in data science and engineering, mathematics, and beautiful code. Feel free to [get in touch](mailto:thunder.shiviah@gmail.com)!

### Updates
* Check out [my slides](https://thundershiviah.github.io/TechFestNW-Hyperparameter_talk/#/) from a recent talk on hyper-parameter optimization in machine learning at [TechFestNW](http://techfestnw.com/).

### Personal Info
github | linkedin | tumblr | twitter
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
